entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
